Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 4
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.This fourth poster of the set shows Hu Feng, spurred on by a spectre-like Chiang Kai-shek (Jiang Jieshi 蒋介石) calling for counter-revolution, mounting an attack with handgrenades from behind a compendium of his literary ideas. Next to him is a Guomindang special agent (特务) brandishing a handgun.
